LowLevelUtilities

Class Utilitiies

  • java.lang.Object
    • LowLevelUtilities.Utilitiies

  • public class Utilitiies
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a utility class that helps in reading data byte data from the underlying stream It reuses the buffers which are created only once when the class is initialized, and also reads byte data from the stream converting it to string/chars when needed and as specified
    Author:
    rohtalwa

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Utilitiies() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void loadValues(Server server, java.lang.String configFileName)
      Tries to instantiate the server from the values provided in the config file, if that fails creates a config file and loads the values from that file
      static java.lang.Boolean loadValuesfromFile(java.lang.String configFileName, Server server)
      Loads the parameter values from the config file into the server object
      void readInit(int bufferCapacity, java.io.InputStream in)
      Initializes the reader configurations, sets the buffer size and the input streams for data input

      Reads a line from the input and returns the number of bytes read breaks reading from new line

    • Method Detail

      • readInit

        public void readInit(int bufferCapacity,
            java.io.InputStream in)
        Initializes the reader configurations, sets the buffer size and the input streams for data input
        Parameters:
        bufferCapacity - the buffer capacity for reading data
        in - the client connection's input stream where the data is pending to be read

      • rwXBytes

        public int rwXBytes(java.io.File rcvdFile,
           long size)
        Reads size bytes from the stream and writes it to the file with specified name
        Parameters:
        rcvdFile - : the file object to write to
        Returns:
        0 if all bytes were written successfully 1 if the file could not be created or 2 if there was some IO error

      • readLine

        public MyLine readLine(java.lang.String encoding)
        Reads a line from the input and returns the number of bytes read breaks reading from new line
        Parameters:
        encoding - : the encoding which is is used to encode the bytes
        Returns:
        MyLine object containing the the total number of bytes read and the encoded string obtained from these bytes Special Cases for the getBytes in the MyLine object Returns -1 if nothing was read and there was an error! Returns 0 if new line was read Returns -2 if the line was greater than the buffer size but buffer sized line is returned (May be garbled -- data not to be relied on if -2)

      • loadValues

        public static void loadValues(Server server,
              java.lang.String configFileName)
        Tries to instantiate the server from the values provided in the config file, if that fails creates a config file and loads the values from that file
        Parameters:
        server - the server which to instantiate
        configFileName - the config file containing the values

      • loadValuesfromFile

        public static java.lang.Boolean loadValuesfromFile(java.lang.String configFileName,
                                   Server server)
        Loads the parameter values from the config file into the server object
        Parameters:
        configFileName - the path name of the config file
        Returns:
        true if the file was successfully opened and used to draw parameters for the server, else false is returned
